newsitem.title: USA: Alaska $158 mln deal yields 6.10 pct in 2017.
newsitem.headline: Alaska $158 mln deal yields 6.10 pct in 2017.

text.p: PaineWebber Inc said Tuesday it tentatively priced $158.2 million Alaska Housing Finance Corp bonds to yield 6.10 percent in 2017.
THIS ISSUE WILL BE IN BOOK ENTRY FORM THROUGH THE FACILITIES
MOODY'S: Aaa/Aaa S&P: AAA/AAA FITCH: AAA/AAA
MATURITY AMOUNT* AMOUNT* COUPON (% of par)
FOR ADDITIONAL INFORMATION REGARDING THE EXTRAORDINARY
REDEMPTION PROVISIONS PLEASE REFER TO YOUR PRELIMINARY
CALL FEATURES: OPTIONAL: (CABS ARE SUBJECT TO OPTIONAL
** 1. UNEXPENDED PROCEEDS - ON ANY DATE ON OR AFTER JUNE 1, 1997 OR ON OR BEFORE JUNE 1, 1999 (UNLESS EXTENDED) IN AN AMOUNT NOT TO EXCEED $45 MILLION (PRO-RATA CURRENT INTEREST BONDS AND CAB'S).
2. PREPAYMENTS/EXCESS REVENUES - ON ANY DATE BEGINNING DECEMBER 1, 1996 FIRST TO THE CURRENT INTEREST BONDS AND THEN TO THE CAPITAL APPRECIATION BONDS.
3. OUTSTANDING BOND LESS THAN $24 MILLION - IN WHOLE ON ANY DATE, AT THE CORPORATION, WHEN THE OUTSTANDING BONDS ARE $24 MILLION OR LESS.

PLEASE NOTE THAT THE PERCENTAGE REQUIREMENT FOR CASH AND INVESTMENT SECURITIES DEPOSITED IN THE SPECIAL RESERVE FUND IS EXPECTED TO BE INITIALLY APPROXIMATELY 7.5% AND THAT THERE WILL BE NO REQUIREMENT TO REPLENISH AMOUNTS WITHDRAWN FROM THE SPECIAL RESERVE FUND OR OTHERWISE MAINTAIN THE SPECIAL RESERVE REQUIREMENT.
The award is expected Wednesday, August 21, 1996.
This issue is book entry through DTC.
